2020/KER/822
IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT HERNAKULAM
PRESENT
THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE P.B.SURESH KUMAR
WEDNESDAY, THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 18TH POUSHA, 1941
Cr1.MC.No.8592 OF 2019 (D)
CRIME NO.776/2019 OF ANCHALUMMOODU POLICE STATION, KOLLAM
PETITIONER:
UMMUHABEEBA K.P.,
AGED 30 YEARS
D/O.MIKHDAD, KIZHAKKEPARAMBAN HOUSE,
CHUNGATHARA P.O., MALAPPURAM - 679 334.
BY ADVS.
SRI.P.S.ABDUL KAREEM
SRI.R.ABDUL AHAD
RESPONDENT:
STATE OF KERALA,
REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR,
HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM - 682 031.
BY SRI.SANTHOSH PETER, PUBLIC PROSECUTOR
THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Pall
Crl.M.C.No.8592 of 2019 2020/KERI822
2
ORDER

The Court of the Judicial Magistrate of the first class â€” Il,
Kollam has issued Annexure - B notice informing the petitioner
that the Chief Judicial Magistrate, Kollam has authorized that court
to record the statement of the petitioner under Section 164 of the
Code of Criminal Procedure in connection with Crime No.776 of
2019 of Anchalummoodu Police Station and directing the
petitioner to appear before the court for the said purpose on
25.11.2019. Annexure - B notice is under challenge in this
Crl.M.C.

2. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner as
also the learned Public Prosecutor.

3. The learned counsel for the petitioner submits that
the petitioner is residing in Malappuram district, and if her
statement is necessary under Section 164 of the Code of Criminal
Procedure, she is prepared to appear before any Magistrate in
Malappuram district, if not inconvenient, before the Judicial
Magistrate of the First Class Nilambur, for the said purpose.

4. A statement under Section 164 of the Code of
Criminal Procedure can be taken by any Magistrate. As such, the
Crl. M.C. is disposed of directing the Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Manjeri to authorize the Judicial Magistrate of the first class,

pe ata
Crl.M.C.No.8592 of 2019 2020/KERI822
3
Nilambur to record the statement of the petitioner under Section
164 of the Code of Criminal Procedure required in connection with
Crime No.776 of 2019 of Anjalumoodu Police Station. The
investigating officer in the case shall take appropriate steps for
the same.
Sd/-
P.B.SURESH KUMAR, JUDGE.
DK
